title: Felipe Fontana Vieira
text: Hello! My name is Felipe. I’m a PhD student in statistical data analysis at G(h)ent University. My main research is about latent interactions. More specifically, I’m involved with the “structural-after-measurement” (SAM) approach and its extensions in the context of nonlinear effects. My supervisor is Prof. Yves Rosseel (yes, the lavaan guy). Besides that, I’m also a co-lead with some wonderful people for one team at Framework for Open and Reproducible Research Training (FORRT).

title: Curriculum vitae
text:
2024-present | PhD Researcher in Statistical Data Analysis, Department of Data-Analysis, Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, Ghent University.
2023-present | Subsequent Master’s degree in Statistical Data Analysis (M.Sc.), Faculty of Science, Ghent University.
2021-2023 | Master’s degree in Psychology (Theory and Research) (M.Sc.), Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, KU Leuven.
2018-2021 | Bachelor’s degree in Psychology, Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, University of Coimbra.

title: Curriculum vitae
text:
Work and Research experience

2024-present | PhD Researcher in Statistical Data Analysis, Department of Data-Analysis, Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, Ghent University.
November 2023 - May 2024 | Part-time Desk Researcher, Verian Group Belgium.
May 2023 - September 2023 | Part-time Research Assistant, Methods, Individual and Cultural Differences, Affect and Social Behavior (OE), KU Leuven.
August 2022 — June 2023 | Part-time Research Assistant, Center for Social and Cultural Psychology (CSCP), KU Leuven.
September 2022 — March 2023 | Full-time Research Intern, Center for Social and Cultural Psychology (CSCP), KU Leuven.
February 2021 — June 2021 | Research Project TEACHmi, Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, University of Coimbra.

title: Curriculum vitae
text:
Poster Presentations and Talks

Vieira, F. F.. A Gentle Introduction to Structural Equation Modeling (Invited talk, hosted by the Quantitative Group). Faculty of Education, Cambridge University, February 10th, 2025.
Vieira, F. F. (presenting author), Jasini, A., Tekin E. A., & Mesquita, B. (2023). Majorities’ emotions acculturate too: The role of intergroup friendships and clarity of minority emotion norms. Poster presented at the ASPO 2023, Utrecht, Netherlands, April 20th-21st, 2023.
Costantino, A., Van Hove, L. (presenting author), Vieira, F. F., & Op de Beeck, H. (2023). Does expertise affect the geometry of object representations in the brain?. Poster presented at the BAPS 2023, Mons, Belgium, May 25th-26th, 2023.
